channel.title: Shop making

item.title: Shop making
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Make sure there is a shop# inside shops.cfg
then add this:

if(NPCID == NPC_ID){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = Shop#; }[/quote]

& make sure your pasting it inside the right packet case. 155 would be talk to for trade, 17 would be right click trade.

Read full topic
